answers.author: Jayme Bosio
answers.text:
The Palm Beach County (FL) Commission adopted a new ordinance on May 17 for a "Commission on Ethics," effective June 1, 2011, which extends jurisdictional oversight to all elected officials and employees of 38 cities in the county. The "PBC Commission on Ethics" web site provides a mission statement, the rules of procedure and complaint process for the public. Address: www.palmbeachcountyethics.com .
